SENDING_IP_ADDRESS_TO_PI_COMMAND

SENDING_IP_ADDRESS_TO_PI_COMMAND

String representation of the command used to scp the IP file Might not currently be configured correctly, consider referencing RASPI_TXT_FILE_FULL_PATH_NAME
